TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BitVector32 extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供一个简单结构，该结构以 32 位内存存储布尔值和小整数。

span.span: Provides a simple structure that stores Boolean values and small integers in 32 bits of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比 用于内部使用的布尔值和小整数更有效。 is more efficient than for Boolean values and small integers that are used internally. 可以根据需要无限增长，但它具有类实例所需的内存和性能开销。A can grow indefinitely as needed, but it has the memory and performance overhead that a class instance requires. 相比之下， 只使用32位。In contrast, a uses only 32 bits. 结构可以设置为包含用于布尔的小整数或位标志的部分，但不能同时包含两者。A structure can be set up to contain either sections for small integers or bit flags for Booleans, but not both. 是中的一个窗口，它由 可以包含中指定的最大值的连续最小位数组成 。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，最大值为1的节仅由一位构成，而最大值为5的节由三位组成。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建一个 最大值为1的，以用作布尔值，从而允许你在同一中存储整数和布尔值 。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 某些成员可用于 设置为部分的，而其他成员可用于作为位标志设置的成员。Some members can be used for a that is set up as sections, while other members can be used for one that is set up as bit flags. 例如， 属性是设置为部分的的索引器 ， 属性是作为 位标志设置的的索引器。For example, the property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 创建一系列屏蔽，这些屏蔽可用于访问中 设置为位标志的中的单个位。 creates a series of masks that can be used to access individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags. 在设置为节的上使用掩码 可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 作为位标志的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of bit flags. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CPP/bitvector32_bitflags.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CS/bitvector32_bitflags.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/VB/bitvector32_bitflags.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用 作为节的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建一系列屏蔽中的第一个屏蔽，该系列屏蔽可以用于检索作为位标志设置的 中的单个位。

span.span: Creates the first mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

returns.span: 一个屏蔽，它隔离 中的第一个位标志。

span.span: A mask that isolates the first bit flag in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 `CreateMask()` 创建序列中的第一个掩码以及 `CreateMask(int)` 所有后续掩码。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以创建多个掩码来引用同一位标志。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 生成的掩码仅隔离中的一个位标志 。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 您可以使用按位 "或" 运算组合掩码来创建在中隔离多个位标志的掩码 。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在设置为节的上使用掩码 可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用掩码。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function CreateMask (previous As Integer) As Integer

param.span: 指示前一个位标志的屏蔽。

span.span: The mask that indicates the previous bit flag.

summary.span: 在一系列屏蔽中的指定屏蔽后面再创建一个屏蔽，该系列屏蔽可以用于检索作为位标志设置的 中的单个位。

span.span: Creates an additional mask following the specified mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

returns.span: 一个屏蔽，它隔离 中 所指向的位标志后面的位标志。

span.span: A mask that isolates the bit flag following the one that points to in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 `CreateMask()` 创建序列中的第一个掩码以及 `CreateMask(int)` 所有后续掩码。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以创建多个掩码来引用同一位标志。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 生成的掩码仅隔离中的一个位标志 。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 您可以使用按位 "或" 运算组合掩码来创建在中隔离多个位标志的掩码 。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在设置为节的上使用掩码 可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用掩码。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是中的一个窗口，它由 可以包含中指定的最大值的连续最小位数组成 。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，最大值为1的节仅由一位构成，而最大值为5的节由三位组成。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建一个 最大值为1的，以用作布尔值，从而允许你在同一中存储整数和布尔值 。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 如果中已存在节 ，这些节仍可访问; 但是，重叠部分可能会导致意外的结果。If sections already exist in the , those sections are still accessible; however, overlapping sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 作为节的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks " [节]" 属性是设置为 "部分" 的的索引器 ，而 " [int]" 属性是 设置为位标志的的索引器。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 是中的一个窗口，它由 可以包含中指定的最大值的连续最小位数组成 。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，最大值为1的节仅由一位构成，而最大值为5的节由三位组成。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建一个 最大值为1的，以用作布尔值，从而允许你在同一中存储整数和布尔值 。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 实现 为 [默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值是一个 O (1) 操作;设置属性也是 O (1) 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks " [节]" 属性是设置为 "部分" 的的索引器 ，而 " [int]" 属性是 设置为位标志的的索引器。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 在设置为节的上使用此属性 可能会导致意外的结果。Using this property on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 实现 为 [默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值是一个 O (1) 操作;设置属性也是 O (1) 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
